memberdef.name: fsg_funcs
memberdef.initializer: = { "fsg", fsg_search_start, fsg_search_step, fsg_search_finish, fsg_search_reinit, fsg_search_free, fsg_search_lattice, fsg_search_hyp, fsg_search_prob, fsg_search_seg_iter, }

briefdescription.para: Generate a lattice from FSG search results.

detaileddescription.para: One might think that this is simply a matter of adding acoustic scores to the FSG's edges. However, one would be wrong. The crucial difference here is that the word lattice is acyclic, and it also contains timing information.

briefdescription.para: Create, initialize and return a search module.
Update FSG search module for new or updated FSGs.
Step one frame forward through the Viterbi search.
Prepare the FSG search structure for beginning decoding of the next utterance.
Windup and clean the FSG search structure after utterance.

memberdef.argsstring: (fsg_search_t *fsgs, int frame_idx, int final, int32 *out_score, int32 *out_is_final)
memberdef.name: fsg_search_find_exit

briefdescription.para: Get hypothesis string from the FSG search.

memberdef.argsstring: (ps_lattice_t *dag, fsg_model_t *fsg, int sf, int32 wid, int32 node_id)
memberdef.name: find_node
